purpleculture_pinyin:
zhuó
luminous; burning; to burn; to cauterize
светящийся; жжение; сжечь; прижигать
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 勺 indicates the sound; 火 (fire) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
焦灼 [ jiāo zhuó ]: (literary) deeply worried
灼热 [ zhuó rè ]: burning hot; scorching; worried
真知灼见 [ zhēn zhī zhuó jiàn ]: penetrating insight
烧灼 [ shāo zhuó ]: to burn; to scorch; to cauterize
灼痛 [ zhuó tòng ]: burn (i.e. wound); burning pain

zhuó: (графема) блестящий, светящийся; ясный, наглядный

humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " fire " and " spoon ", the original meaning is burning and burning. "Shuowen": "Burning also. From the fire, the sound of the spoon." "Shu‧Luogao": "Nothing like a fire begins with a flame, so you can burn the narrative, and it is superb." Sun Xingyanshu: "The Burner, "Guangzhou" "Ya ‧ Shi Gu" Yun, Xuan Ye."

" Burning " can mean burns or scalds. Han Huankuan's "Salt and Iron Theory-Zhou Qin": "Therefore, those who dare not hold the fire, see that there is burning."

" Zhao " also means to illuminate. "Shu‧Lu Xing": "Being burnt in the four directions, not only the work of virtue."

" Zhao " also expressed understanding. "Shu‧Lizheng": "I know how to overcome it." Cai Chen's collection of biography: "I should be able to know where he is going."

" Shining " also means panic and panic. "Dialect" thirteenth: "Burning, shocking." Guo Pu's note: "I still have clouds and fear of burning." "The Book of the Later Han Dynasty-Chu Wangying Biography": "As we know the truth, we cherish mourning."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " fire " and " spoon ", the original meaning is burning and burning.
humanum_full_description:
從「火」，「勺」聲，本義為燒、炙。《說文》：「炙也。从火，勺聲。」 《書‧洛誥》：「無若火始燄燄，厥攸灼敘，弗其絕。」孫星衍疏：「灼者，《廣雅‧釋詁》云，爇也。」

　　「灼」可表示燒傷、燙傷。漢桓寬《鹽鐵論‧周秦》：「故未嘗灼不敢握火者，見其有灼也。」

　　「灼」也表示照亮。《書‧呂刑》：「灼于四方，罔不惟德之勤。」

　　「灼」還表示明白。《書‧立政》：「我其克灼知厥若。」蔡沈集傳：「當能明知其所順。」

　　「灼」亦表示驚恐、惶恐。《方言》第十三：「灼，驚也。」郭璞注：「猶云恐灼也。」《後漢書‧楚王英傳》：「既知審實，懷用悼灼。」

Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 勺 indicates the sound; 火 (fire) conveys the meaning.
Freq: 2867
Kanshudo mnemonic:to ladle (勺) out fire (火) is miraculous
Chinese: The chef uses his ladle to block the flames from scorching him.  
Meaning: scorch
Story: The chef uses his ladle to block the flames from scorching him.  
Kind: both

從「 火 」，「 勺 」聲，本義為燒、炙。《說文》：「炙也。从火，勺聲。」 《書‧洛誥》：「無若火始燄燄，厥攸灼敘，弗其絕。」孫星衍疏：「灼者，《廣雅‧釋詁》云，爇也。」 「 灼 」可表示燒傷、燙傷。漢桓寬《鹽鐵論‧周秦》：「故未嘗灼不敢握火者，見其有灼也。」 「 灼 」也表示照亮。《書‧呂刑》：「灼于四方，罔不惟德之勤。」 「 灼 」還表示明白。《書‧立政》：「我其克灼知厥若。」蔡沈集傳：「當能明知其所順。」 「 灼 」亦表示驚恐、惶恐。《方言》第十三：「灼，驚也。」郭璞注：「猶云恐灼也。」《後漢書‧楚王英傳》：「既知審實，懷用悼灼。」
From the sound of " fire" and " spoon", the original meaning is burning and burning. "Shuowen": "Burning also. From the fire, the sound of the spoon." "Shu‧Luogao": "Nothing like a fire begins with a flame, so you can burn the narrative, and it is superb." Sun Xingyanshu: "The Burner, "Guangzhou" "Ya ‧ Shi Gu" Yun, Xuan Ye." " Burning" can mean burns or scalds. Han Huankuan's "Salt and Iron Theory-Zhou Qin": "Therefore, those who dare not hold the fire, see that there is burning." " Zhao" also means to illuminate. "Shu‧Lu Xing": "Being burnt in the four directions, not only the work of virtue." " Zhao" also expressed understanding. "Shu‧Lizheng": "I know how to overcome it." Cai Chen's collection of biography: "I should be able to know where he is going." " Shining" also means panic and panic. "Dialect" thirteenth: "Burning, shocking." Guo Pu's note: "I still have clouds and fear of burning." "The Book of the Later Han Dynasty-Chu Wangying Biography": "As we know the truth, we cherish mourning."

灼字的基本解释

灼
zhuó
烧，炙：灼热。灼伤（烧伤）。焦灼。心急如灼。
明白透彻：真知灼见。
鲜明：灼灼。灼亮。灼然。

灼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhuó］
［《廣韻》之若切，入藥，章。］
亦作“燋3”。
(1)烧；炙。
(2)引申为焦急。参见“灼怛”。
(3)烧伤；烫伤。
(4)照亮。
(5)比喻以言语中伤。
(6)明白。
(7)彰著。
(8)鲜明貌。
(9)旺盛。
(10)惊恐；惶恐。
(11)用作量词。
(12)见“灼灼”。
(13)见“灼然”。

灼字的英文翻译

◎ 灼
bright, burn, luminous, scorch

灼字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　灼； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页666第17
【唐韻】之若切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】職略切，?音酌。【說文】炙也。【玉篇】熱也。【廣韻】燒也。【魯語】如龜焉。灼其中，必文於外。【前漢·霍光傳】灼爛者，在於上行。　又【玉篇】明也。【書·洛誥】無若火始燄燄，厥攸灼敘弗其絕。又【立政】我其克灼知厥若。　又【玉篇】灼灼，花盛貌。【詩·周南】灼灼其華。　又【揚子·方言】灼，驚也。【註】猶云：恐?也，煎盡也。【後漢·楚王傳】旣知審，寔懷用悼灼。　又【唐韻正】之邵反。同炤。【禮·中庸】引《詩》：亦孔之炤。作亦孔之灼。◎按今文作昭。　又【越絕書】灼龜，作炤龜。

灼字的源字形

灼字的起名意思

：表示烧、炙；明白透彻；鲜明等含义。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhuó］
["Guang Yun" is cut, used as medicine, chapter. ]
Also known as "燋3".
(1) Burning; broiling.
(2) The extension is anxiety. See "Zhao Da".
(3) Burns; scalds.
(4) Illuminate.
(5) The metaphor is slanderous in words.
(6) Understand.
(7) Zhang works.
(8) Bright appearance.
(9) Exuberant.
(10) Panic; panic.
(11) Used as a quantifier.
(12) See "Shining".
(13) See "Zhao Ran".

灼
会意字。火表意,其形像火苗,表示用火烤烫;从勺,勺是舀酒的器具,舀酒有一定的限度,用火烫物也有一定的限度。
本义是烧烤。

жечь, печь, обжигать, накалять; прижигать
